lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First off, we have our wonderful Ashley Johnson back!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a wild Ashley at the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam if you want a few words.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'm required by law to give equal time to my opponent. So tonight I'm going to turn it over to Liam O'Brien to see what he wants to talk about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While my overwhelming lead in the polls should be a comfort to us all--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, the polls can be wrong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To that end, in an effort to shine a light on corruption and illuminate any of you still in doubt it does me and the Everlight herself my great honor to formally announce-- (lip flapping) formally announce my running mate on the road--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's literally no one you can announce that would have any chance of beating me, but go on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come with me to D&D and beyond, Ashley Johnson.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You all know where I stand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ashley, welcome back. The table top is yours.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: As Liam's running mate it is only fitting that I drop some running hate.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are the people supposed to rally behind a guy who looks like a donkey wearing a Jeff Goldblum mask? (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And that is all I have to say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow! I have a compelling, convincing--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like I've been trampled by some sort of livestock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That roast of Sam Riegel will be on Comedy Central at about 1:00pm tonight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is the best funeral dirge I ever heard.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, it's good to be back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, my head hurts, my head hurts

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I'm going to throw up now. Back to you, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've been able to watch Marisha just catapult her way through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, catapult is what I was going to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We all drew Gilmore, which is really exciting, my boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Matt, you can't draw for shit, man, and it's crazy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, it was really sad to see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We also have one more week left of our Kickstarter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just wanted to keep it on the Kickstarter, can we not make it about The Ring?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, on that note, speaking of which, Sam set the secret stretch goal that if we manage to hit 10 million by the end of this we're going to put all in on filming Travis going through the hauntedest of houses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we get to go with him, or does he have to go by himself to the haunted--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There are no rules to this secret stretch goal because it was invented on the fly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we talk to them about us working the haunted house while he's going through?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to get punched in the face through a rubber mask!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's better if he doesn't know who's behind it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've never struck nor will ever strike a haunted house worker. I am too busy screaming, peeing myself, and hiding in the corner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have it coming, too. I'm so excited.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's achievable, this goal is achievable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't need to hit the lights.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like you have Freddie Mercury with you hitting the high notes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have one merch update from you, Laura, I believe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So woo! That's all. I just wanted to let you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh this, this old beanie? This is our prototype that we just got in for our Kickstarter, one of our swags.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It just says Critical Role on the leather.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's pretty legit, that's pretty hot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so I wanted to wear it tonight. It's neat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you, what would you like to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, well that was a good game, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess we should all go downstairs and talk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hopefully didn't keep you up long.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You seem more alert than you've been in a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah well, I've been trying to give you more caffeine lately, maybe to give you a little pick up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it makes a difference, adding a little bit more caffeine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a heavy green tea. It's got a good pickup.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I like it a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take a little bit of time alone in the room since Beau is gone to journal and draw some stuff and let the Traveler know exactly what we've been doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything in particular, or are you just going down to join folks?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just the use, found some bacon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your beasts that were delivered "are scaring away the customers. If you could--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He points out there and soon as he points you hear (snarling and growling).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should probably do something about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, wrong thing first in the morning? All right, I'm open to suggestions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a place you would recommend us putting them up so that they do not bother the people in the area? A stable of some sort?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keep them chained up, just not by the front, please."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we were to keep them on the premises, is there a particular place that you would most like them to be hidden if you had your pick of?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to leave a gold coin on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three of them are sitting there, curled up in the front pulling at the chains. One of them is biting into the side of it and people are keeping a very wide berth around your creatures.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It seems like extra security for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they carnivores or are they omnivores?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them proceeds to relieve itself in a heaping warm pile right in front of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That giant horse panther is definitely a carnivore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he's out front. Want to come say hi?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take them around back, why don't we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you, without the touch of their trained master in the immediate proximity, a slight pet to keep them calm. As soon as Fjord emerges, one of them goes (growls).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We spent so much money on something that's going to eat us one day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it was a good investment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Speaking on the investment part, going off of what Fjord was saying with security, maybe we could loan them to the local guard or something for a light fee while we're here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just don't think Yarnball will listen to anybody but me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are we up to this morning?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we have some errands to run if I recall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right, we were going to split up, weren't we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh we were going to talk to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, library, blacksmith, look for some general groceries.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Raise your hand if you want to go seek knowledge and look at books and stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're the only enthusiastic ones about this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's fine. We're just deciding Who goes where right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm more of a shop browsing and a blacksmith kind of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before you guys leave, if you guys want us to buy diamonds somebody help because I don't think we have enough money to buy a bunch of diamonds and stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who wants to give us all their money?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, not all of the money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a really good thing we're doing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just better safe than sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can also buy some candy and some pretty dresses if we want to, with their money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much does your diamond need to cost?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, let's take a look, there's a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a bigger one, though, now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I place 20 platinum in Jester's hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa! You need that, we're about to go find books and stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester is going to take that, if we are going to be exploring this country we don't know what we're going to run into, so that is for the party.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they're all 500gp, if I remember--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be nice but that's also assuming we're going to find some diamonds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We also put some of our money in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to give some money too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here I'll give you a hundred gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You saw the Bright Queen's armor, they've got to have really cool stuff here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think there were opals on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we meet up at a certain time and/or place?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Back at the inn and just send a message if you should decide we should meet somewhere else.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's going with you? Is it you two?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you do me a favor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're generally shopping as well then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you do me a favor--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we'll take care of that, but a straight razor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can always give you another shave again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, for fun once in a while, but I don't want to trouble you constantly and--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I actually really like doing it, but I understand if you want to have something a little bit more portable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can walk yourself anywhere you need to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still please look for the razor for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, you know what? Caleb, if it's all right with you I think I'll go with the shopping party as well, because Yeza might need some new clothes and stuff and I can take him along as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, well we'll just go shopping and then--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about you buddy, you want to come with the shopping party and make the flip flop complete? Send Caleb out there by himself?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean as humorous as that is to me, I'm interested in books.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be best not to send anybody solo anywhere, it's always good to have a buddy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before they leave though I want to talk to you about--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a really important thing I need to ask of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we need to step away, are we good?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When you're in the library, I need you to do something for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need you to draw a couple of dicks in the books, okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make sure it happens because I won't be there to do it for myself and it's really important.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this for Traveler Con? You mentioned--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, if you want to to draw some people naked in there or like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll look for the ass trumpeters that are sometimes in the margins and then it will just blend right in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh that would be so wonderful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just got that reference, carry on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so it's the two of you heading towards the conservatory, the Marble Tomes? The Marble Tomes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Meet back at the inn at what time, high 12 o'clock?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got your medallions right? You're two humans on your own, you've got your medallions of protection right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm, that's a really good point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The medallions that the Bright Queen gave us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not in a back pocket, not in--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have that in your front pocket ready to flash it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right Veth, we have it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I haven't showered in a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you doing with a random ass stick in your armpit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, we went down a well, I fought Dairon in the woods.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you should probably bathe soon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't smell a single thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you guys heading first? What are you looking for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to find a blacksmith, because I'm still trying to find somebody who can do something with this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy, can I get some help with this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to each roll independently?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It smells so good over there--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of these days, one of these days.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll see what it says later, on Monday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him taking a big mouthful of whatever he's eating and he stops, continues to chew and just looks at you all with this very focused eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you artisan that operates these amazing devices?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eye to eye. And this guy's been doing a forge for a long time, the immediate comparison of half-orc him to half-orc Fjord, it's a Laurel and Hardy sketch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: His neck has a six pack, kind of thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (accent similar to Fjord's) "I don't think I'm familiar with your kind."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't seen any firbolgs at all since I've come to this city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've been having a lovely time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So I work here, what do you need?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's something I've been knowing that I will find eventually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me have a look." He takes it, tattoos are beautiful and intricate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 13, no better than that. Oh my god, my numbers now. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's capturing some sort of not-geometric shape.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's some spectacular work you have there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think she would be most impressed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These are important to my hometown, "so wouldn't recommend her giving them out."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no. I think she would just really enjoy seeing them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your hometown? Where are you from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gives you a look over. Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Boraftkrah. It's a village out there in the Rime Plains."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These are designs of the nearby Dunrock "on the north side where our village "and our hunting grounds were."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is actually our first day--if you can call it that-- in the city. We've never been here before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where are you all from? "You're asking me my background; I'm real curious now."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm from a very small temple that's deep in the forests north of the Empire, very far north.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, I don't know if you've ever been there before, but have you ever heard of the Blooming Grove?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Blooming Grove. Can't say I have, sorry."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Greying Wildlands is "where I'm from, but there's only really--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've never heard of the Blooming Grove before? Oh wait, wait, the Bone Orchard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I never got used to that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I recall that's what people said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what some people have said. That's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Morathkrah the same, you know, stature?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, not as huge down the Menagerie Coast. I'm from Port Damali.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, you went and grown up "in some of that human territory."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, not too many of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, well you do the best with what you've got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've being from the Menagerie Coast, "I imagine you've seen quite a bit, too, in your days."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it doesn't bother me so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mr. Fjord has saved my life on a couple of occasions, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's true. He can carry a barrel with only just a little bit of assistance from one of our ladies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's excited by big muscular types.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've seen it sir, he can lift--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Many barrels by myself. Unaided. Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's stopped paying attention at this point and is looking over the handle and the hilt and the edges, the very bottom part of the broken blade.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, the technique used "in the construction of this thing is definitely-- "while we're on the topic--from up north."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just keep hoping that I'm going to find somebody who knows what to do with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You'd have to probably take it there."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's where them dwarves and elves live together."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good to know. I keep-- That's a place that eventually I hope to go to then or at least find somebody from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, my folks from my village are just hunting, "surviving, getting by. The northern orcs "and those are beginning to push into the Alps there, "they're a little more bloodthirsty."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any advice, one wanderer to another, if we ever come across your people of the best way to keep ourselves properly ingratiated?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anything else I can help you with? "Any other questions you got?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You wouldn't happen to know where to get a jewel or a diamond? We're looking to buy some jewels if you would know if there's some around town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They don't let us in all the firing forges."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We appreciate your time and appreciate you taking a moment of your day for that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My friend, who I was speaking of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like your tattoos those are really cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do really good tattoos, want me to do one for you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you ever change your mind, you know where to find me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're friends of the Dynasty. We're really cool and stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All righty, well, I didn't realize "I was in the presence of such "whatever the word is for your people."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, don't judge a book by its cover, friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I appreciate that, keeping me company here "in this blasting heat." he puts a foot down in the bellows and the forge flares up a bit, the orange glow fills the chamber a bit and the temperature jumps for a moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, when you have a need, you'll be the first we find, thank you friend.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what was your name again?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wursh, I actually don't think we got your name at all. So sorry, Wursh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anyway, we should be heading off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you heard of him or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he walks toward the edge and looks toward the door and goes, "Hey, "come here a second, I want to talk to you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is happening, what is happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You said you grew up in Menagerie Coast, right?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk around like you got something to prove?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that what it looks like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Some of us, we don't let that blood rule us, huh? "I know you feel the anger there every now and then, "but don't let them define you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They don't look unkindly on our kind where you come from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hm, don't get too many human folk up north."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I had an apprenticeship up north, "I was trying to go for it, but it's a bit dangerous "in the Alps to get to the sanctum so I headed south.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you had the right folk heading up that way, would you consider heading up there again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You walking everywhere with your pelvis forward like that "and looking to start a fight with anybody that calls you "on, well, that attitude, you're going to end up shivved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure we'll see each other again, Wursh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's like a-- He heads on inside and he shoulders past you all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know how he did that, that was amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see how many abs he had?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean even his advice had abs, that was crazy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He seemed like a super nice guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Sol Rosenberg) Do we have any shoes and glasses so that I can have them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we walk I pat his shoulder and I say, don't worry Fjord you have really good abs too I felt them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, you don't have to make me feel better--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're taller than me, you're really tall in comparison to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was just a very large gentleman in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he's pretty big, but sometimes that's not a good thing, sometimes being a normal size is good too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, like me that's a good thing--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, is some of your family as big as him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know my family so I don't think so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that was an insight check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have been waiting for something. That's a 22.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know who my family is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean I don't see the resemblance, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did have an accent similar to yours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh huh, little bit of a difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just in the height, but you looked pretty similar in the teeth, nope, your teeth are not, I don't it really didn't look alike, but you had similar accents.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Find a tree in that hole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The kids around me I guess, just learned from being around other orphans.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean you didn't even have your muscles to protect you so you had to rely on wits and cleverness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm the only one of me around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone named an orphanage after wood that needs to be somewhere else or really just wants to go somewhere else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's also wood that if you find it, it's nice sometimes, you can make art out of it--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't say it was a great place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My husband has been walking around barefoot all day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To be fair, barefoot is a rather common way "that I walk around but where we come from "it's generally a lot grassier."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's stepped on many, many rocks.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: They're not working. Scatter!" Some muttering and voices and--

lines.text: While you guys are all glancing forward--

lines.text: "It was affixed to it when the fighting began "with the Empire. Originally it was just a mining camp, "so it's tacked on."

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is a "there is a blacksmith installation "a little ways south "and further on the way down it has about a ten feet "space between the wall and the actual building, "that would maybe allow you a bit of a quiet entry."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is up to you. I am--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could you just put a little X on this crude thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To this point here, this blacksmith to that point there, where we're seeing these two gentleman with their stones, how far apart are those two points, would you guess?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel pretty confident about everything we've gotten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we do a circuit first and then go there? Should we do a two-party circuit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it crazy, crazy stealthy, though because those giants they can see over the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we do it on foot?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's bring the moorbounders a little further into the forest, maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that you've done plenty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do too, I'm good, I'm done."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you," as soon as he gets the gold, he turns around and quietly begins walking back where he came.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only if it's a head shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's split up and go around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do we want to split this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll go right down the middle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going right or left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I should go right, you go left so that we split the clerics.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as we split the clerics, we should be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so stealth rolls for the troop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The most cocked of any I have ever rolled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Ashley, stealth check, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just step on its tail and it (screams) and it attacks your ankle and you kick it off off to that side. You look back at the rest of the group, you just hear (pounding).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just their half of the party, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anything that we can all duck and cover nearby, like nearby tree line?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you all think you've ducked and covered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all hide and you watch as two of them look over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How far away, how far away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you are right now, I'd say you're eyeballing about 60 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm getting ready to run because I know what's coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the other one is further back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It chucks a large stone that's heading right for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 24 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be 25 points of bludgeoning damage and then you have to make a strength saving throw to me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, do I have resistance to bludgeoning? I'm just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not raging, so you don't.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What did you just say to do? I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength saving throw for me, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning) Pick up on this next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sometimes you can get around it, sometimes you can't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: ♪ There are big tall terrible giants in the mine ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man. We're jumping back into it next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're doing a brunch next week or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can, but whatever we're wearing we have to wear for the after party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's save the brunch for another day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll save the brunch for something else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll do it for like something another like a one-shotty thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We missed you. So glad to have you back.
